rooms.description: Spacious entrance area with built-in wheelchair access ramp, local stone finish, and Vastu-aligned entry placement.
Contemporary open-plan living area with large windows for natural light, ensuring a Vastu compliant south-east orientation.
Modern kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring high efficiency design and easy wheelchair access.
Wheelchair accessible bedroom with an adjoining balcony for natural ventilation.
Spacious master bedroom with built-in wheelchair access, equipped with a balcony ensuring privacy and fresh air.

openings.description: Large windows for ample natural light aligned with south-east Vastu directions.
Efficient kitchen ventilation windows designed for easy access and natural airflow.

vastu_guidelines.entrance: Aligned with the south-eastern corner, providing energy flow.
vastu_guidelines.kitchen: Placed away from the main entrance to avoid negative Vastu influences.
vastu_guidelines.bedrooms: Positioned on north or west sides for better relaxation.
